modules.title: Crew Module
modules.description: Pressurized capsule designed for three Vyomnauts with indigenous ECLSS, touchscreen avionics, and deceleration systems.

modules.title: Abort & Safety
modules.description: Demo missions (TV-D1, D2) validate quick escape motors and recovery in the Bay of Bengal with the Indian Navy.

modules.title: Mission Timeline
modules.description: Uncrewed flights in 2025â€“26 will precede the first crewed LEO mission, leveraging LVM3 and HAL-built crew modules.
